name: The Knight (RadzioGadzioPL)
description:
Welcome Sir!

You've been invited to Competition for The Greatest Knight medal. 

You'll be tested hardly. We'll be shooting some stuff at you. However we'll sometimes give you some power ups just to survive. 

How long can you survive? Will you do it? Queen is waiting for your answer!

Controls:

LMB - use Sword

RMB/Space - use Shield

WSAD - moving

ESC - pause menu

Made for 6th Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Programs used:

  • Unity
  • Aseprite
  • Freesound.org

PS. Be prepared for some surprise...
